ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Ideology Expanded Addon - Better Pacifists
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
This simple mod slightly modifies how the pacifism is considered by the Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures:
- Attacking pawns does not count as hurting them as long as you don't damage them - Non-lethal weapons don't count as hurting pawns, unless they actually cause harm or permanent damage or death - Attacking a downed pawn will always count as hurting them, even with non-lethal weapons - The list of non-lethal weapons is configurable (with a couple of defaults) - Applies to "Violence: Abhorrent" when hurting humanoid pawns as well as "Ranching: Disliked" when hurting animals
